developer._instruction: Add all parties that developed this workflow recipe version. Note that these developers will overwrite the developer list provided for the overarching workflow recipe.

digitalIdentifier._instruction: Add the globally unique and persistent digital identifier of this research product version.

format._instruction: Add the content type of this workflow recipe version.

hasPart._instruction: Add all entities that are components of this workflow recipe version (e.g., other workflow recipe versions or software used in this workflow).

isAlternativeVersionOf._instruction: Add all workflow recipe versions that can be used alternatively to this workflow recipe version.

isNewVersionOf._instruction: Add the workflow recipe version preceding this workflow recipe version.

license._instruction: Add all licenses of this workflow recipe version.
